title: Ginger duck with noodle salad and spicy peanut dressing
ingredients: ['3 tbsp fish sauce or soy sauce', '2 tbsp toasted sesame oil', '1 tbsp soft dark brown sugar', '50g fresh root ginger, peeled and chopped', '4 duck breast fillets, about 190g each', '250g baby corn', '200g dried medium egg noodles', '400g bean sprouts', '200g pak choi, shredded', '8 spring onions, sliced', '1 red chilli, halved, seeded and thinly sliced', '2 tbsp smooth or crunchy peanut butter', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '1 garlic clove, crushed']
